questions.question: A sudden move pushes the posterior from Bull(65%) to Sideways(55%). Most appropriate action:
options: Hold or reduce size until the new regime stabilizes
questions.explanation: Shifts call for caution and confirmation, not aggressive adds.

questions.question: If your confidence threshold is 0.70 and current confidence is 0.62, how much must confidence increase (in percentage points) to trigger your entry rule?
Name one indicator you’d monitor to validate a regime shift besides price.
questions.answer_text: Volume/volatility change, breadth, or macro risk proxy depending on your stack.
